"@Evident Disaster":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53e988bc6368720a11730000#post_53e988bc6368720a11730000
Of course! A counter magnetic field would protect against most EMP strikes. However, the energy required would be tremendous and a too large battery pack would slow down the soldier too much. And a special rifle could be developed to penetrate the armour and deliver the EMP charge directly.
